channel.title: ::Give Command
channel.description:
Can someone give me the ::Give Command? i tried searching but theres so many results that have nothing to do with what i need. so i figured ill just post. Basicly all i want it to do is this: "::Give 0995 Brandon" And that would give the item '0995'(gp) To user 'Brandon'.
Can any1 make or give me one they have? would be greatly appreciated.

item.title: ::Give Command
item.dc:creator: @Treber Treber
item.description:
@Treber wrote:

[quote=“xxlukexx, post:10, topic:310628”][quote author=Jordiescape link=topic=407058.msg3007278#msg3007278 date=1256499550]

if (command.startsWith("giveitem") && playerRights >= 3) { try { String[] cmd = command.split(" "); int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(cmd[1]); if (otherPIndex != -1) { client p = (client) PlayerHandler.players[otherPIndex]; sM("You give "+p.playerName+" item "+cmd[2]); p.sM(playerName+" has given you an item."); p.addItem(Integer.parseInt(cmd[2]), Integer.parseInt(cmd[3])); } else {} } catch (Exception e) {} }
or if u want it for a admin to give it its

if (command.startsWith("giveitem") && playerRights >= 2) { try { String[] cmd = command.split(" "); int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(cmd[1]); if (otherPIndex != -1) { client p = (client) PlayerHandler.players[otherPIndex]; sM("You give "+p.playerName+" item "+cmd[2]); p.sM(playerName+" has given you an item."); p.addItem(Integer.parseInt(cmd[2]), Integer.parseInt(cmd[3])); } else {} } catch (Exception e) {} } [br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 25, 2009, 12:30:58 pm[/size][hr]i know u wont donate coz that other person is faster then me and hes prob smarter but im a slow typer and if u want to u can donate to me please i really need it coz i need a .com site its xxpkpurexx@live.com

you prob just took my piece of code then changed 1 number which im sure he already knew how.

Fuck off, I originally wrote that you idiot.

what did i say u faggot? i gave him a command what he wanted and u come along yapping your mouth off, tell me whats wrong dog.

You said it was your code you idiot.
[/quote]

i said “you prob took my peace of code” (as in, copy and paste into another reply and change the number)[/quote]
Dis be quote pyramid? :o.

Read full topic
